item.title: 0x6FD7 docker images and internal CAs
item.description: I use an internal CA for all the services in my home lab. Big part of the lab is running on docker swarm. Usually services connect through internal networks (without using HTTPS as that is offloaded to traefik), but sometimes they do need to validate the certificates (such as interacting with the NAS or router APIs).
